---
title: Python之生成散点图
date: 2018-08-04 09:31:22
tags:
	- Python

---



```
import pandas as pd
import matplotlib.pyplot as plt

data = [
    533,417,307,192,71,-45,-158,-260,-360,-445,-531,-587,-632,-676,-707,-727,-704,-676,-631,-572,-496,-406,-299,-175,-45,81,199,318,448,561,659,737,791,854,902,929,949,957,943,928,889,821,739,645,-229,-411,-589,-723,-857,-1006,-1153,-1286,-1389,-1510,-1604,-1647,-1676,-1705,-1706,-1687,-1625,-1532,-1416,-1292,-1163,-1002,-815,-631,-443,-261,-122,27,190,339,448,548,630,678,718,729,710,677,627,535,418,285,147,-26,140,127,88,59,30,12,1,-13,-30,-39,-48,-77,-97,-93,-85,-62,-33,-9,17,55,78,80,70,68,57,37,19,7,-8,-7,11,31,29,21,34,44,83,107,118,143,175,173,153,154,941,736,484,223,-43,-264,-476,-680,-854,-978,-1082,-1186,-1245,-1279,-1288,-1295,-1295,-1274,-1252,-1229,-1223,-1246,-1281,-1308,-1345,-1365,-1345,-1273,-1169,-1056,-908,-739,-538,-325,-97,158,385,600,789,946,1090,1174,1211,1148,320,-348,-903,-1445,-1940,-2436,-2847,-3239,-3651,-3946,-4126,-4245,-4364,-4336,-4205,-3987,-3729,-3347,-2832,-2266,-1656,-1024,-341,422,1113,1683,2235,2812,3351,3772,4169,4491,4727,4842,4844,4727,4569,4324,3918,3436,2938,2376,1748,1100,-1554,-1665,-1783,-1895,-1963,-2014,-2090,-2157,-2177,-2149,-2067,-1970,-1847,-1658,-1425,-1182,-924,-613,-275,55,348,613,842,1052,1229,1369,1446,1446,1380,1276,1143,1006,869,716,544,348,141,-61,-275,-505,-753,-984,-1182,-1359,-804,-1970,-3097,-4161,-5142,-6017,-6770,-7387,-7857,-8164,-8307,-8284,-8094,-7736,-7223,-6565,-5775,-4866,-3859,-2775,-1635,-461,722,1890,3021,4090,5075,5959,6722,7349,7827,8147,8304,8290,8108,7764,7263,6615,5831,4931,3931,2851,1713,541,-804,-1970,-3097,-4161,-5142,-6017,-6770,-7387,-7857,-8164,-8307,-8284,-8094,-7736,-7223,-6565,-5775,-4866,-3859,-2775,-1635,-461,722,1890,3021,4090,5075,5959,6722,7349,7827,8147,8304,8290,8108,7764,7263,6615,5831,4931,3931,2851,1713,541,
]
SIZE=44
# x = [1,2,3]
x = range(SIZE)
y1 = data[0:SIZE]
y2 = data[SIZE:2*SIZE]
y3 = data[2*SIZE:3*SIZE]
y4 = data[3*SIZE:4*SIZE]
y5 = data[4*SIZE:5*SIZE]
y6 = data[5*SIZE:6*SIZE]
y7 = data[6*SIZE:7*SIZE]
y8 = data[7*SIZE:8*SIZE]

plt.plot(x,y1,'o' )
plt.plot(x,y2, '-')
plt.plot(x,y3, '.')
plt.plot(x,y4, '^')
plt.plot(x,y5, '*')
plt.plot(x,y6, '<')
#plt.plot(x,y7, '>')
#plt.plot(x,y8, '.')


plt.show()
```
